duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist Anesthesiologist in administering anesthesia and monitoring patient vital signs during surgical procedures.
Provide patient care and support during pre-operative, intra-operative, and post-operative phases.
Assist in medical diagnosis, record management, and surgical procedures as per healthcare protocols.
Attend to emergency medical situations and provide immediate response and assistance.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to ensure coordinated patient care and safety.
Maintain accurate patient records and ensure compliance with healthcare regulations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Physician Assistant Studies or a related field (Master's preferred)
